rules.prepare: # This package has no configure script. true
rules.build: cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make -j"$BOLT_PARALLEL_JOBS" \ CFLAGS="-g -O2 -Wformat -Werror=format-security -Wdate-time" \ CC=gcc \ LD=ld \ AS=as \ AR=ar
rules.install: cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" mkdir -p "$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR/usr" make SHLIBDIR="\$(DESTDIR)/usr/lib" DESTDIR="$BOLT_INSTALL_DIR" install
